item.title: Stream is blocked, 7th November
item.description:
Foliage debris is blocking this drainage stream and may case flooding once we get more rain

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowthorpe Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Wet leaves on pavement at bus stops either side of the road make it dangerous getting off the bus. Also blocking drains causing flood issue., 7th November
item.description:
Bus stops outside 2 Long Mynd Avenue, excessive amount of leaves from the green.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Long Mynd Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: The green light only lasts for less than 3 seconds. Exiting from Lavington dr and further has become troublesome with this short signal time., 7th November
item.description:
Green signal time is very short. Long traffic lines, school bus congestion.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nine Elms Road, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Road work signs left here, 6th November
item.description:

item.title: Swing seats are covered in algae/mould, 6th November
item.description:
Children's swings in Greenways park. Unpleasant/unsafe for children to sit in as it will ruin clothes and potentially carry germs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenways, Barnwood, Gloucester

item.title: Mattress deposited in driveway on Dunalley Street, 6th November
item.description:
A stained double mattress has been left in the driveway between No 28 and No 30 Dunalley Street. It has been in situ for the last two days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Gate, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oak tree beneath phone lines, this has recently been pollarded (two days ago) but the top remains in contact with several phone lines to properties., 6th November
item.description:
The oak tree is in Caernarvon Close, besides the wooden outbuilding of 81 Caernarvon Road. Next to telegraph pole with ‘BT 11M O2 3I’ on it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Caernarvon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
